channel.title: Kubernetes Objects Map
channel.description: Recent content on Kubernetes Objects Map

item.description: graph BT; classDef storage fill:#f9f,stroke:#333,stroke-width:4px; classDef net fill:#faf,stroke:#333,stroke-width:4px; class svc net,ep,ing; style pod fill:#f9f,stroke:#333,stroke-width:4px subgraph workloads container["Container(s)"]--pod[Pod] pod--scale--replicaset pod--scale--ReplicationController pod--statefulset[StatefulSet] pod--ds[DaemonSet] replicaset[ReplicaSet]--deployment[Deployment] pod--job[Job] pod--cronjob[CronJob] pod--hpa[HorizontalPodAutoscaler] end subgraph discovery & load balancing pod--exposed by--svc[Service] ep[Endpoints]--svc svc--direct https traffic--ing[Ingress] end subgraph config & storage pv[PersistentVolume]-.satisfies.-pvc pvc[PersistentVolumeClaim]--volumes sc[StorageClass]-.dynamically provisions.-pv pv--may belongs to single--sc configmap--exposes as env variables--pod configmap--exposes as files--volumes secret--exposes as env variables--pod secret--exposes as files--volumes volumes--mounts inside as files or dirs--pod[Pod] end
